long_description: The K2 Automatic ski poles deliver reliable performance on the ski slopes. High-strength 6061 aircraft aluminum shaft offers excellent durability at a great price. Thermoplastic rubber grips fit securely in your hands. Small baskets work well in most snow conditions, especially hardpack. The K2 Automatic ski poles feature adjustable wrist straps. Please note that these are standard ski poles; "Automatic" is simply the name and does not indicate a self-activating mechanism of any sort.
short_description: The K2 Automatic ski poles deliver reliable performance on the ski slopes.
